## Source: kam193 (1a522c8b8020b2bc892dccb2ac852a0a95c0eeb3fc0f94f7e4fff0da98979fa1)
Packages silently decrypt content hidden in a dependency and load them as Python extension modules. 

In the first wave, those are copies of legitimate aiohttp and aiohappyeyeballs packages.
In the second wave, malicious packages created good-looking forks of legitimate rich and pigments packages.


---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.
Campaign: 2025-10-asynhttp
Reasons (based on the campaign):
 - typosquatting
 - exfiltration_generic
 - obfuscation
 - clones_real_package
